lead_paragraph: Pastels flourished on the spring runways, so it's only natural that proper ladylike jewels should land a spot on the favorites list, too. Instead of a hearty centerpiece belt (as seen on Céline, Chloé and Altuzarra's more utilitarian/minimal looks), opt for more romantic accouterments (à la Chanel) and wear opera pearls, like this freshwater strand by Mikimoto, above, as a belt. Iris Apfel says, "Chanel did it, I do it. Why not?"
